xdi2.core
Interface Statement

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<Statement>, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
Statement.ContextNodeStatement, Statement.LiteralStatement, Statement.RelationStatement
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractStatement, AbstractStatement.AbstractContextNodeStatement, AbstractStatement.AbstractLiteralStatement, AbstractStatement.AbstractRelationStatement
public interface Statement
extends Serializable, Comparable<Statement>

This interface represents a statement in an XDI graph. A statement consists of a subject, predicate and object.

Author:
markus
